name: GO GO GRETZILLA!
description:
Go Go Gretzilla is a top down 3D action game in which the player takes on the role of Greta Thunberg as a mechanised Godzilla-like force of nature, taking action against an uncaring world by taking on the big polluters and fossil fuel industries while protecting and allowing the creation of green alternatives.

The player must traverse the Mario Galaxy style world, smashing polluting buildings and vehicles as well as not destroying green energy alternative structures.

The player wins when enough global energy is green but will lose if enough pollution is allowed to be released.

Controls:

WASD = Movement (Tank Controls)
Space = Attack (AoE)

Credits:

Martin Cooke - Design & Programming

Will Bullen - 3D Art & Texturing

Harry Good - 3D Art & Programming

Will Jennett - 2D Art, VFX & Sound

Karl Eric Eggart - 3D Animations
